archimate:Contract.name: Power BI Pro
archimate:Contract.documentation: Power BI Pro is a subscription service offered by Microsoft that allows users to share insights, collaborate with teammates, and publish reports across an enterprise. It enables the distribution of content to other users, and the consumption of content shared by others. The Pro version supports live data sources with full interactivity, application lifecycle management, higher dataset refresh rates, and more storage capacity. It is tailored for users who need to leverage advanced analytics, perform peer-level sharing, and create app workspaces.
